statements: SELECT * FROM meeting_records
SELECT recording_id, meeting_date, duration FROM meeting_records
SELECT recording_id, recording_url FROM meeting_records WHERE duration > 60
SELECT transcript_text FROM meeting_records WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM meeting_records ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, duration
SELECT * FROM meeting_records WHERE recording_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT recording_url, meeting_date FROM meeting_records WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT recording_id, transcript_text FROM meeting_records WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY recording_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS meeting_count FROM meeting_records WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT AVG(duration) AS average_duration FROM meeting_records;
SELECT * FROM meeting_recordings;
SELECT recording_id, meeting_date FROM meeting_recordings WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT recording_url FROM meeting_recordings WHERE recording_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM meeting_transcripts WHERE processed = TRUE;
SELECT transcript_text, recording_id FROM meeting_transcripts ORDER BY transcript_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_recordings WHERE recording_id = 1;
SELECT recording_id, meeting_date FROM meeting_recordings WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM meeting_transcripts WHERE processed = TRUE;
SELECT recording_id, transcript_text FROM meeting_transcripts WHERE transcript_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_recordings FROM meeting_recordings;
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT recording_url, duration_minutes FROM recordings WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT meeting_title, organizer_name, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE organizer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT transcript_text FROM transcripts WHERE meeting_id = 3 ORDER BY transcript_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM recordings ORDER BY recording_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_title, organizer_name FROM meetings WHERE organizer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_title, recording_url, recording_date FROM meetings JOIN recordings ON meetings.meeting_id = recordings.meeting_id ORDER BY recording_date ASC;

SELECT meetings.meeting_title, COUNT(transcripts.transcript_id) AS transcript_count FROM meetings LEFT JOIN transcripts ON meetings.meeting_id = transcripts.meeting_id GROUP BY meetings.meeting_title ORDER BY transcript_count DESC;
SELECT meeting_title, transcript_text FROM meetings JOIN transcripts ON meetings.meeting_id = transcripts.meeting_id WHERE transcript_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_topic, recording_url FROM meetings;
SELECT speaker_id, speaker_name FROM speakers ORDER BY speaker_name DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT transcript FROM meetings WHERE meeting_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM meetings
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic, recording_url FROM meetings
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees
SELECT speaker_name FROM speakers
SELECT keyword_name FROM keywords
SELECT * FROM MeetingRecordings;
SELECT recording_url FROM MeetingRecordings WHERE recording_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT topic_title, topic_description FROM MeetingTopics ORDER BY topic_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM MeetingFeedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeetingRecordings ORDER BY recording_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT meeting_id, recording_url FROM MeetingRecordings WHERE recording_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recording_date ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM MeetingAttendees WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT topic_title, topic_description FROM MeetingTopics WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM MeetingTranscripts WHERE transcript_timestamp BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2021-12-01 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2021-12-31 23:59:59';
